ComicInfo.Summary: Lady Death Fan Edition 1: All Hallow's Evil. A tale of Lady Death gaining revenge on the village and the priest that was responsible for her burning at the stake and subsequent decent into hell . One Halloween in the Nexus she finds the demon that brought her to hell and witnesses how the villagers who condemned her were preparing a ceremony. The demon says that he can only transport her spirit and only for few moments but this is all she needs. She pretended to be a goddess who can help the villagers crops grow but requires a sacrifice, she names the priest who branded Hope a witch and they sacrifice the priest to her. The villagers plant their seeds and the next morning villagers are surprised to see full grown crops. She cursed the seeds and pumpkins rise and slaughter the villagers.
